title: Otome wa Boku ni Koishiteru: Trinkle Stars The Animation
synopsis: Hisoka was an orphan who was raised by Yukitaka, the present head of the worldwide Jinsei Corporation, with the help of his right-hand man Daisuke. He was adopted for the sole purpose of working both publicly and secretly for his daughter Orihime, who was next in line to inherit the business. Thatâ€™s why he did not hesitate when he was asked by Yukitaka to attend the same school as her and serve as her bodyguard in secret.
